org.primaresearch.web.gwt.server

Class SimpleSoapRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.server.SimpleSoapRequest

  • public class SimpleSoapRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for sending simple SOAP requests and extracting the content of the SOAP response.
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Detail

      • addMethodParameter

        public void addMethodParameter(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String value)
        Adds a parameter for the method that is to be called. Each parameter is added as a child element of the method element in the SOAP request (XML). The parameter value is added as text content of the child element.

      • send

        public java.lang.String send()
                      throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                             javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                             java.net.MalformedURLException
        Sends the request to the SOAP service and handles the response.
        Returns:
        Content of the response.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
